thread.title: Man Teaching Wife To Drive Crashes Into Long Island Office Building « CBS New York
thread.title_full: Man Teaching Wife To Drive Crashes Into Long Island Office Building « CBS New York

title: Man Teaching Wife To Drive Crashes Into Long Island Office Building « CBS New York
text:
Man Teaching Wife To Drive Crashes Into Long Island Office Building February 18, 2017 10:37 PM Filed Under: Long Island , Melville A man was teaching his wife how to drive in a Long Island parking lot Saturday when he lost control and their SUV crashed into a nearby office building, police said. (Credit: Melville fire department) 
MELVILLE, N.Y. (CBSNewYork) — A man was teaching his wife how to drive in a Long Island parking lot Saturday when he lost control and their SUV crashed into a nearby office building, officials said. 
The accident happened around 2:30 p.m. at 900 Walt Whitman Road in Melville. (credit: Melville fire department) 
Fire officials said the Volkswagen SUV slammed into the side of the building, crashing through a chiropractor’s office, destroying the reception desk and heavily damaging the office. (credit: Melville fire department) 
Fortunately, the office had closed about an hour and a half earlier and there was no one inside. (credit: Melville fire department) 
The couple had to be extricated from the SUV. They were evaluated on the scene but declined to go to the hospital.
